## LeagueEntry.summoner property

The summoner this data belongs to.

Uses [SummonerManager.fetch()](./shieldbow.summonermanager.fetch.md) to get the summoner.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get summoner(): Promise<Summoner>;
```
